The Twilight Zone

Release date:
January 1, 1994

James's old star rating:

★★☆☆☆

"average or below"

James's old number rating:

6/10

Old site description:

Self made nighmarish sequence which shows me wandering about my house encountering bizarre apparitions at every turn. Bares no relation to the classic TV series, but uses the music. This is the first movie in which I added music after the video was shot. I played the movie with my camera pointing toward the TV screen and re-recorded it while my tape player played the music next to the camera.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
